title: Delivery workers’ safety
summary: High injury and fatality rates among app-based delivery workers; need for enforceable protections and safe routing.
details: Track policy changes, accident statistics, and commitments by platforms. Elevate firsthand accounts and union statements.

title: Urban air quality
summary: Air pollution continues to harm public health, especially children and the elderly.
details: Track PM2.5/PM10 policy targets, real-time monitors, and enforcement actions. Link to community groups.

title: Digital divide
summary: Unequal access to broadband and devices leaves parts of society behind in education, work, and services.
details: Track fiber coverage, affordability programs, and public Wi‑Fi. Encourage device donation drives.
